links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
formula: a(n) = 3 + (-1)^n - 2*(binomial(2*n, n) mod 2), with n >= 0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 11 2009
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(sqrt(6)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b040003.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 01 2009(MAGMA) [3+(-1)^n-2*(Binomial(2*n, n) mod 2): n in [0..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 03 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
